title: can't log out of perma-banned account
body: hi, i got permanently banned but i cannot log out as i've selected the stay logged in option, now whenever i open league it just says that i'm banned and only allows me to close it. help please

replies.body:
Player Support should be able to help you out: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

A quicker suggestion (though I haven't had it confirmed it works) is to log into the account in the browser and change the password. The client should then prompt you to re-login and you can switch accounts/tick or untick the "stay logged in".
Changing the password works and this is so important dude tahnks alot you just saved 3 hours of doing nothing for me MUCH LOVe{{summoner:4}}
thank you for the swift response, i appreciate it
